body.p: can display callouts for review items such as comments and tracked changes. To customize options for review callouts, and go to Editor Edit modes Author Review Callouts .

The available options are as follows:
Show review callouts for:
Comments If enabled, callouts are displayed for comments. This option is enabled by default.
Track Changes deletions If enabled, callouts are displayed for tracked change deletions and the following additional option becomes available:
Show deleted content in callout If enabled, the deleted content is also displayed in the callout.
Track Changes insertion If enabled, callouts are displayed for tracked change insertions and the following additional option becomes available:
Show inserted content in callout If enabled, the inserted content is also displayed in the callout.
Callouts Rendering Options section
Show review time When enabled, timestamp information is displayed in the callout.
Show all connecting lines When enabled, lines connect the callout to the location of the change.
Callouts pane width (px) Sets the width of the callout field. The default is 200 pixels.
Callouts text limit (characters) Sets the number of characters shown in the callout. The default is 160 characters. Note that this does not limit the number of characters in a comment. It only limits the number of characters shown in the callout. To see the full comment, right-click on the callout and select Edit Comment.
